Read a MeteoSchweiz SwissMetNet export file

Source: R/read-smn.R
read_meteoschweiz_smn.Rd

Read a MeteoSchweiz SwissMetNet export text file (such as '') and restructure the data into long format

read_meteoschweiz_smn(x, timezone = "Etc/GMT", encoding = "UTF-8",
  time_format = "%Y%m%d%H%M")

Arguments

x

Either a path to a file, a connection, or literal data. see readr::read_delim()
timezone

time zone of date fields. Be carefull Etc/GMT '+' actually signifies '-' and vice versa, e.g. 'Etc/GMT-1' = UTC + 1. Default: "Etc/GMT"
encoding

file encoding. Default: "UTF-8"
time_format

of data in file, different for 10min and 1H

Value

tibble in rOstluft long format structure

See also

base::timezones - Information about time zones in R

base::strptime - Information about time format strings in R

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
